## Windows Audit workbook
---

Welcome to your new workbook.  This area will display text formatted as markdown.


We've included a basic analytics query to get you started. Use the `Edit` button below each section to configure it or add more sections.

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.label: â˜ï¸ Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: resourceGroup
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where id == "{Workspace}"
| project resourceGroup

// ===============================================
// Sentinel Windows Audit Coverage - DCs (Overview)
// ===============================================
//
// Purpose:
// - For Domain Controllers only, detect audit coverage gaps by subcategory:
//   * Missing important events (audit not enabled for required subcategories)
//   * Over-collection (non-required events being collected)
// - Presence-only model: we only care whether any "Success"/"Failure" event
//   occurred in the time window (count >= 1), not the volume.
//
// Inputs:
// - TimeRange parameter (start, end)
// - PolicyProfile parameter: "General" or "Stronger"
// - SecurityEvent table
//
// Output (per subcategory):
// - Verdict (Missing Success/Failure/Both, Over-collected, OK, N/A)
// - PercentAffected, AffectedHosts, TotalHosts
//
// Notes:
// - DC scope is inferred from Kerberos events (4768/4769/4771) seen in the window.
// - Outcome is derived from Keywords ("Success" or "Failure").
// - "Optional" requirement (SuccessOptional=true) can relax Success requirement
//   when Failure is not required (see Effective RequireSuccess).
//
// -----------------------------------------------

set query_results_cache_max_age = time(10m);
set query_results_cache_per_shard;
let start = {TimeRange:start};
let end   = {TimeRange:end};
let MinCount = 5;
let PolicyProfileRaw = tostring("{PolicyProfile}");
let PolicyProfile = iif(PolicyProfileRaw in ("General","Stronger"), PolicyProfileRaw, "General");

// ===============================================
// 1) Subcategory configuration (Category / Scope / EventIDs in scope)
//    - Scope: "DC" or "All"
//    - Event lists define which EventIDs represent Success/Failure presence for a subcategory

let SubcatConfig = datatable(Subcategory:string, Category:string, Scope:string, SuccessEvents:dynamic, FailureEvents:dynamic)
[
  "Credential Validation",           "Account Logon",  "All",  dynamic([4774,4776]),            dynamic([4775,4777]),
  "Kerberos Authentication Service", "Account Logon",  "DC",   dynamic([4768]),                 dynamic([4771,4772]),
  "Kerberos Service Ticket Operations", "Account Logon",  "DC",   dynamic([4769,4770]),         dynamic([4769,4773]),
  "Other Account Logon Events", "Account Logon",  "All",   dynamic([]),         dynamic([]),
  "Computer Account Management", "Account Management",  "DC",   dynamic([4741,4742,4743]),         dynamic([]),
  "Other Account Management Events", "Account Management",  "All",   dynamic([4782,4793]),         dynamic([]),
  "Security Group Management", "Account Management",  "All",   dynamic([4727,4737,4728,4729,4730,4731,4732,4733,4734,4735,4754,4755,4756,4757,4758,4764,4799]),         dynamic([]),
  "User Account Management", "Account Management",  "All",   dynamic([4720,4722,4723,4724,4725,4726,4738,4740,4765,4767,4780,4781,4794,4798,5376,5377]),         dynamic([4723,4724,4766,4794]),
  "PNP Activity", "Detailed Tracking",  "All",   dynamic([6416,6419,6420,6421,6422,6423,6424]),         dynamic([]),
  "Process Creation", "Detailed Tracking",  "All",   dynamic([4688,4696]),         dynamic([]),
  "Process Termination", "Detailed Tracking",  "All",   dynamic([4689]),         dynamic([]),
  "RPC Events", "Detailed Tracking",  "All",   dynamic([5712]),         dynamic([]),
  "Detailed Directory Service Replication", "DS Access",  "DC",   dynamic([4928,4929,4930,4931,4934,4936,4937]),         dynamic([4928,4929,4930,4931,4935]),
  "Directory Service Access", "DS Access",  "DC",   dynamic([4662,4661]),         dynamic([4662,4661]),
  "Directory Service Changes", "DS Access",  "DC",   dynamic([5136,5137,5138,5139,5141]),         dynamic([]),
  "Directory Service Replication", "DS Access",  "DC",   dynamic([4932,4933]),         dynamic([4933]),
  "Account Lockout",                     "Logon and Logoff","All", dynamic([]),       dynamic([4625]),
  "User/Device Claims",                     "Logon and Logoff","All", dynamic([4626]),       dynamic([]),
  "Group Membership",                     "Logon and Logoff","All", dynamic([4627]),       dynamic([]),
  "Logoff",                    "Logon and Logoff","All", dynamic([4634,4647]),            dynamic([]),
  "Logon",                     "Logon and Logoff","All", dynamic([4624,4648,4675]),       dynamic([4625]),
  "Special Logon",                     "Logon and Logoff","All", dynamic([4964,4672]),       dynamic([]),
  "Detailed File Share",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([5145]),       dynamic([5145]),
  "File Share",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([5140,5142,5143,5144]),       dynamic([5140,5168]),
  "Filtering Platform Connection",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([5154,5156,5158]),       dynamic([5031,5155,5157,5159]),
  "Filtering Platform Packet Drop",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([5153]),       dynamic([5152]),
  "Handle Manipulation",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([4658,4690]),       dynamic([]),
  "Kernel Object",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([4656,4658,4660,4663]),       dynamic([4656]),
  "Other Object Access Events",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([4691,4698,4699,4700,4701,4702,5888,5889,5890]),       dynamic([5148,5149]),
  "Removable Storage",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([4656,4658,4663]),       dynamic([4656]),
  "Central Policy Staging",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([4818]),       dynamic([]),
  "Policy Change",                     "Policy Change","All", dynamic([4715,4719,4817,4902,4906,4907,4908,4912,4904,4905]),       dynamic([]),
  "Authentication Policy Change",                     "Policy Change","All", dynamic([4670,4706,4707,4716,4713,4717,4718,4739,4864,4865,4866,4867]),       dynamic([]),
  "Authorization Policy Change",                     "Policy Change","All", dynamic([4703,4704,4705,4670,4911,4913]),       dynamic([]),
  "MPSSVC Rule-Level Policy Change",                     "Policy Change","All", dynamic([4944,4945,4946,4947,4948,4949,4950,4954,4956]),       dynamic([4951,4952,4953,4957,4958]),
  "Other Policy Change Events",                     "Policy Change","All", dynamic([4714,4819,4826,5063,5064,5065,5066,5067,5068,5069,5070,5447,6144]),       dynamic([5063,5064,5065,5066,5067,5068,5069,5070,6145]),
  //"Non Sensitive Privilege Use",                     "Privilege Use","All", dynamic([4673,4674,4985]),       dynamic([4673,4674]),
  "Other Privilege Use Events",                     "Privilege Use","All", dynamic([4985]),       dynamic([]),
  "Sensitive Privilege Use",                     "Privilege Use","All", dynamic([4673,4674,4985]),       dynamic([4673,4674]),
  "Other System Events",                     "System","All", dynamic([5024,5025,5033,5034,5058,5059]),       dynamic([5027,5028,5029,5030,5032,5035,5037,5058,5059]),
  "Security State Change",                     "System","All", dynamic([4608,4609,4616,4621]),       dynamic([]),
  "Security System Extension",                     "System","All", dynamic([4610,4611,4614,4622,4697]),       dynamic([]),
  "System Integrity",                     "System","All", dynamic([4612,4615,4618,4816,5056,5062,5061]),       dynamic([5038,5057,5060,5061,6281,6410]),
  "Other Logon/Logoff Events",                     "Logon and Logoff","All", dynamic([4649,4778,4779,4800,4801,4802,4803,5632,5633]),       dynamic([5378])
];

// ===============================================
// 2) Policy matrix (requirements per Role/Profile)
//    - RequireSuccess / RequireFailure: whether Success/Failure presence is required
//    - SuccessOptional: if true and Failure not required, Success requirement can be relaxed

let PolicyMatrix = datatable(Subcategory:string, Role:string, Profile:string, RequireSuccess:bool, RequireFailure:bool, SuccessOptional:bool)
[
  "Credential Validation", "Domain Controller",  "General",  false, true,  true,
  "Credential Validation", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true,  true,  false,
  "Credential Validation", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true,  true,  false,
  "Credential Validation", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true,  true,  false,
  "Kerberos Authentication Service", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true,  true,  false,

  "Computer Account Management", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, false,

  "Computer Account Management", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, false, false,

  "Other Account Management Events", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, false, false,
  "Other Account Management Events", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", false, false, false,
  "Security Group Management", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, false,
  "Security Group Management", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, false, false,

  "PNP Activity", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, false, false,
  "Process Creation", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, false,

  "Removable Storage", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, true, false,
  "Removable Storage", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, true, false,
  "Removable Storage", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, true, false,
  
  "Central Policy Staging", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, true,
  "Central Policy Staging", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, false, true,
  "Central Policy Staging", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, false, true,
  "Central Policy Staging", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, false, true,


  "Policy Change", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, false,

  "Policy Change", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, false, false,


  "Authentication Policy Change", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, false,
  "Authentication Policy Change", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, false, false,

  "Authentication Policy Change", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, false, false,


  "Authorization Policy Change", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, true,
  "Authorization Policy Change", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, false, true,

  "Authorization Policy Change", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, false, true,


  "MPSSVC Rule-Level Policy Change", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, true, false,
  "MPSSVC Rule-Level Policy Change", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, true, false,
  "MPSSVC Rule-Level Policy Change", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, true, false,
  "MPSSVC Rule-Level Policy Change", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, true, false,

  "Other Policy Change Events", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, true, true,
  "Other Policy Change Events", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, true, true,
  "Other Policy Change Events", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, true, true,
  "Other Policy Change Events", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, true, true,

//  "Non Sensitive Privilege Use", "Domain Controller",  "General",  false, false, false,
//  "Non Sensitive Privilege Use", "Member/Workstation", "General",  false, false, false,
//  "Non Sensitive Privilege Use", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", false, false, false,
//  "Non Sensitive Privilege Use", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", false, false, false,

  "Other Privilege Use Events", "Domain Controller",  "General",  false, false, false,
  "Other Privilege Use Events", "Member/Workstation", "General",  false, false, false,
  "Other Privilege Use Events", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", false, false, false,
  "Other Privilege Use Events", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", false, false, false,

  "Sensitive Privilege Use", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, true, false,
  "Sensitive Privilege Use", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, true, false,
  "Sensitive Privilege Use", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, true, false,
  "Sensitive Privilege Use", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, true, false,


  "Other System Events", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, true, false,
  "Other System Events", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, true, false,
  "Other System Events", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, true, false,
  "Other System Events", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, true, false,


  "Security State Change", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, false,
  "Security State Change", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, false, false,
  "Security State Change", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, false, false,
  "Security State Change", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, false, false,


  "Security System Extension", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, false,
  "Security System Extension", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, false, false,
  "Security System Extension", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, false, false,
  "Security System Extension", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, false, false,


  "System Integrity", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, true, false,
  "System Integrity", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, true, false,
  "System Integrity", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, true, false,
  "System Integrity", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, true, false,




  "Logon", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, true, false,
  "Logon", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, true, false,
  "Logon", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, true, false,
  "Logon", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, true, false

];

// ===============================================
// 3) DC-only fast path for the Overview
// 3.1) Identify DCs by Kerberos events within the window

let DCsOnly =
    SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated between (start .. end)
    | where EventID in (4768,4769,4771)
    | summarize by Computer;

// 3.2) EventID -> Subcategory mapping (used for filtering and joins)
let EventMap = materialize(
    (
      SubcatConfig
      | mv-expand EventID = SuccessEvents
      | project Subcategory, Category, Scope, EventID = toint(EventID)
    )
    | union
    (
      SubcatConfig
      | mv-expand EventID = FailureEvents
      | project Subcategory, Category, Scope, EventID = toint(EventID)
    )
    | summarize by Subcategory, Category, Scope, EventID
);

// 3.3) Presence-only summary for DC-originated events that are in scope
let EventSummaryDC =
    SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated between (start .. end)
    | where Computer in (DCsOnly)
    | join kind=inner hint.strategy=broadcast (EventMap) on EventID
    | extend Outcome = case(
        Keywords == "0x8020000000000000","Success",
        Keywords == "0x8010000000000000","Failure",
        "Unknown")
    | summarize
        SuccessCnt = max(toint(Outcome=="Success")),
        FailureCnt = max(toint(Outcome=="Failure"))
      by Computer, Category, Subcategory, Scope
    | extend Total = SuccessCnt + FailureCnt;

// 3.4) Universe: all (DC, subcategory) pairs where Scope in ("DC","All")
let SubcatsForDC = SubcatConfig | where Scope in ("DC","All") | project Category, Subcategory, Scope;
let Universe =
    DCsOnly | extend k=1
    | join kind=inner (SubcatsForDC | extend k=1) on k
    | project Computer, Category, Subcategory, Scope;

// 3.5) Per-host status (Role is DC)
let PerHostDC =
    Universe
    | join kind=leftouter EventSummaryDC on Computer, Category, Subcategory
    | extend SuccessCnt = tolong(coalesce(SuccessCnt, 0)),
             FailureCnt = tolong(coalesce(FailureCnt, 0)),
             Total      = tolong(coalesce(Total, 0)),
             Role       = "Domain Controller"
    | join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=broadcast (PolicyMatrix | where Profile == PolicyProfile and Role == "Domain Controller") on Subcategory
    | extend RequireSuccess   = tobool(RequireSuccess),
             RequireFailure   = tobool(RequireFailure),
             SuccessOptional  = tobool(SuccessOptional)
    | extend NoRequirement    = (not(RequireSuccess) and not(RequireFailure))
    | extend OptionalOverrides= (SuccessOptional and RequireSuccess and not(RequireFailure))
    | extend EffRequireSuccess= iff(OptionalOverrides, false, RequireSuccess)
    // Presence-only threshold = 1 (exists/doesn't exist in the window)    
    | extend SuccessOK        = iff(EffRequireSuccess, SuccessCnt >= 1, true),
             FailureOK        = iff(RequireFailure,  FailureCnt >= 1, true)
    | extend OverSucc         = (not(EffRequireSuccess) and SuccessCnt > 0),
             OverFail         = (not(RequireFailure)   and FailureCnt > 0)
    | extend OverCollected    = (OverSucc or OverFail),
             OverReason       = case(OverSucc and OverFail, "Success+Failure",
                                     OverSucc,              "Success",
                                     OverFail,              "Failure", "")
    | extend Status = case(
         NoRequirement and Total == 0,                    "OK (not required)",
         NoRequirement and Total  > 0,                    "Over-collected",
         OptionalOverrides and Total == 0,                "OK (not required)",
         OptionalOverrides and Total  > 0,                "OK",
         Total == 0,                                      "N/A",
         not(SuccessOK) and not(FailureOK),               "Missing (both)",
         not(SuccessOK),                                  "Missing Success",
         not(FailureOK),                                  "Missing Failure",
         OverCollected,                                   "Over-collected",
                                                          "OK")
    | project Computer, Role, Category, Subcategory, Status, OverCollected, OverReason;

// ===============================================
// 4) Aggregation & verdicts
//    - Order statuses by impact to compute worst status per subcategory

let StatusOrder = datatable(Status:string, Ord:int)
[
  "Missing (both)", 0,
  "Missing Failure", 1,
  "Missing Success", 2,
  "Over-collected", 3,
  "OK", 4,
  "OK (not required)", 4,
  "N/A", 5
];
let Ord2Status = datatable(Ord:int, WorstStatus:string)
[
  0, "Missing (both)",
  1, "Missing Failure",
  2, "Missing Success",
  3, "Over-collected",
  4, "OK",
  5, "N/A"
];

let Base =
    PerHostDC
    | extend StatusNorm = case(
        Status == "OK (not required)", "OK",
        isempty(Status), "N/A",
        Status
      )
    | join kind=leftouter (StatusOrder) on $left.StatusNorm == $right.Status
    | project Category, Subcategory, Computer, Ord,
              OverCollected = tobool(column_ifexists("OverCollected", false)),
              OverReason;

let Totals =
    Base
    | summarize TotalHosts = dcount(Computer) by Category, Subcategory;

let WorstPerCat =
    Base
    | summarize WorstOrd = min(Ord) by Category, Subcategory;

let WorstCount =
    Base
    | join kind=inner (WorstPerCat) on Category, Subcategory
    | where Ord == WorstOrd
    | summarize AffectedHosts = dcount(Computer),
                OverReasons = make_set_if(OverReason, OverCollected and isnotempty(OverReason))
        by Category, Subcategory, WorstOrd;

WorstCount
| join kind=leftouter (Ord2Status) on $left.WorstOrd == $right.Ord
| join kind=leftouter (Totals) on Category, Subcategory
| extend PercentAffected = todouble(AffectedHosts) / todouble(TotalHosts) * 100.0
| extend Verdict = iff(WorstStatus == "Over-collected" and array_length(OverReasons) > 0,
                       strcat("Over-collected (", tostring(OverReasons[0]), ")"),
                       WorstStatus)
| project Category, Subcategory, Verdict,
          PercentAffected = round(PercentAffected, 1),
          AffectedHosts, TotalHosts
| order by Category asc, Subcategory asc
content.title: Domain Controller Audit Summary

// ===============================================
// Sentinel Windows Audit Coverage - Servers (Overview)
// ===============================================
//
// Purpose:
// - Show audit-coverage posture for non-DC servers (Member/Workstation) by subcategory:
//   * Missing important events (required Success/Failure not present)
//   * Over-collection (collecting when not required)
// - Presence-only model: we only check if at least one Success/Failure event occurred
//   within the time window; event volume is not evaluated.
//
// Inputs:
// - TimeRange parameter (start, end)
// - PolicyProfile parameter: "General" or "Stronger"
// - SecurityEvent table
//
// Output (per subcategory):
// - Verdict (Missing Success/Failure/Both, Over-collected, OK, N/A)
// - PercentAffected, AffectedHosts, TotalHosts
//
// Notes:
// - DCs are excluded via a Kerberos-DC heuristic (4768/4769/4771).
// - Outcome is inferred uniformly from Keywords ("Success"/"Failure").
// - SuccessOptional can relax Success requirement when Failure is not required.
//
// -----------------------------------------------
// 0) Parameters / context
set query_results_cache_max_age = time(10m);
set query_results_cache_per_shard;
let start = {TimeRange:start};
let end   = {TimeRange:end};
let MinCount = 5;
let PolicyProfileRaw = tostring("{PolicyProfile}");
let PolicyProfile = iif(PolicyProfileRaw in ("General","Stronger"), PolicyProfileRaw, "General");

// 1) Subcategory configuration (Category / Scope / EventIDs in scope)
//    - Scope: "DC" or "All"
//    - EventID lists define which events signal Success/Failure presence for a subcategory.


let SubcatConfig = datatable(Subcategory:string, Category:string, Scope:string, SuccessEvents:dynamic, FailureEvents:dynamic)
[
  "Credential Validation",           "Account Logon",  "All",  dynamic([4774,4776]),            dynamic([4775,4777]),

  "Filtering Platform Packet Drop",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([5153]),       dynamic([5152]),

  "Other Object Access Events",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([4691,4698,4699,4700,4701,4702,5888,5889,5890]),       dynamic([5148,5149]),
  "Removable Storage",                     "Object Access","All", dynamic([4656,4658,4663]),       dynamic([4656]),

  "Authorization Policy Change",                     "Policy Change","All", dynamic([4703,4704,4705,4670,4911,4913]),       dynamic([]),

  "Other Policy Change Events",                     "Policy Change","All", dynamic([4714,4819,4826,5063,5064,5065,5066,5067,5068,5069,5070,5447,6144]),       dynamic([5063,5064,5065,5066,5067,5068,5069,5070,6145]),
  //"Non Sensitive Privilege Use",                     "Privilege Use","All", dynamic([4673,4674,4985]),       dynamic([4673,4674]),
  "Other Privilege Use Events",                     "Privilege Use","All", dynamic([4985]),       dynamic([]),

  "Security State Change",                     "System","All", dynamic([4608,4609,4616,4621]),       dynamic([]),

  "Other Logon/Logoff Events",                     "Logon and Logoff","All", dynamic([4649,4778,4779,4800,4801,4802,4803,5632,5633]),       dynamic([5378])

// 2) Policy matrix (requirements per Role/Profile)
//    - RequireSuccess / RequireFailure indicate presence requirements
//    - SuccessOptional: if true and Failure is not required, Success may be relaxed


let PolicyMatrix = datatable(Subcategory:string, Role:string, Profile:string, RequireSuccess:bool, RequireFailure:bool, SuccessOptional:bool)

//  "Non Sensitive Privilege Use", "Domain Controller",  "General",  false, false, false,
//  "Non Sensitive Privilege Use", "Member/Workstation", "General",  false, false, false,

  "Other Privilege Use Events", "Domain Controller",  "General",  false, false, false,
  "Other Privilege Use Events", "Member/Workstation", "General",  false, false, false,
  "Other Privilege Use Events", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", false, false, false,
  "Other Privilege Use Events", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", false, false, false,

  "Logon", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, true, false

// 3) Build the base host set from ALL configured EventIDs (Success + Failure)

let AllEventIds_Early =
    (
      SubcatConfig
      | mv-expand e = SuccessEvents
      | project EventID = toint(e)
    )
    | union
    (
      SubcatConfig
      | mv-expand e = FailureEvents
      | project EventID = toint(e)
    )
    | summarize by EventID;
let BaseHosts =
    SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated between (start .. end)
    | where EventID in (AllEventIds_Early)
    | summarize by Computer;

// 4) Role inference helpers
// 4.1) DC heuristic: presence of Kerberos auth events â†’ Domain Controller
let DCHeuristic =
    SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated between (start .. end)
    | where EventID in (4768, 4769, 4771)
    | summarize by Computer
    | extend IsDC = true;

// 4.2) Final Roles: all base hosts; mark non-DCs as Member/Workstation
let Roles =
    BaseHosts
    | join kind=leftouter DCHeuristic on Computer
    | extend Role = iff(IsDC == true, "Domain Controller", "Member/Workstation")
    | project Computer, Role;


// 5) Member/Workstation fast path for the Overview
// 5.1) DC list (to exclude from MW population)
let DCsOnly =
    SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated between (start .. end)
    | where EventID in (4768,4769,4771)
    | summarize by Computer;

// 5.2) EventID -> Subcategory map for Scope="All" (compact and reusable)
let EventMap_All = materialize(
    (
      SubcatConfig
      | where Scope == "All"
      | mv-expand EventID = SuccessEvents
      | project Subcategory, Category, Scope, EventID = toint(EventID)
    )
    | union
    (
      SubcatConfig
      | where Scope == "All"
      | mv-expand EventID = FailureEvents
      | project Subcategory, Category, Scope, EventID = toint(EventID)
    )
    | summarize by Subcategory, Category, Scope, EventID
);

// 5.3) Member/Workstation population: non-DC hosts with any in-scope events (Scope="All")
let AllEventIds_AllScope = EventMap_All | summarize by EventID;
let MemberHosts = materialize(
    SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated between (start .. end)
    | where EventID in (AllEventIds_AllScope)
    | summarize by Computer
    | join kind=leftanti DCsOnly on Computer
);

// 5.4) Presence-only aggregation per host x subcategory (Success/Failure seen at least once)
let EventSummary_MW =
    SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated between (start .. end)
    | where Computer in (MemberHosts)
    | join kind=inner hint.strategy=broadcast (EventMap_All) on EventID
    // Ð¼Ð¾Ð¶Ð½Ð¾ Ñ‡ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒ Ð¿Ð¾Ð´ÑÑƒÑˆÐ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ð¿Ð¾Ñ‚Ð¾Ðº, Ð¾ÑÑ‚Ð°Ð²Ð¸Ð² Ñ‚Ð¾Ð»ÑŒÐºÐ¾ Success/Failure:
    | where Keywords in ("0x8020000000000000","0x8010000000000000")
    | extend IsSucc = toint(Keywords == "0x8020000000000000"),
             IsFail = toint(Keywords == "0x8010000000000000")
    | summarize
        SuccessCnt = max(IsSucc),
        FailureCnt = max(IsFail)
      by Computer, Category, Subcategory, Scope
    | extend Total = SuccessCnt + FailureCnt;

// 5.5) Universe: (Member/Workstation hosts) Ã— (Scope="All" subcategories)
let SubcatsForAll = SubcatConfig | where Scope == "All" | project Category, Subcategory, Scope;
let Universe_MW =
    MemberHosts | extend k=1
    | join kind=inner (SubcatsForAll | extend k=1) on k
    | project Computer, Category, Subcategory, Scope;

// 5.6) Per-host status for Member/Workstation (presence threshold = 1)
let PerHost_MW =
    Universe_MW
    | join kind=leftouter EventSummary_MW on Computer, Category, Subcategory
    | extend SuccessCnt = tolong(coalesce(SuccessCnt, 0)),
             FailureCnt = tolong(coalesce(FailureCnt, 0)),
             Total      = tolong(coalesce(Total, 0)),
             Role       = "Member/Workstation"
    | join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=broadcast (PolicyMatrix | where Profile == PolicyProfile and Role == "Member/Workstation") on Subcategory
    | extend RequireSuccess   = tobool(RequireSuccess),
             RequireFailure   = tobool(RequireFailure),
             SuccessOptional  = tobool(SuccessOptional)
    | extend NoRequirement    = (not(RequireSuccess) and not(RequireFailure))
    | extend OptionalOverrides= (SuccessOptional and RequireSuccess and not(RequireFailure))
    | extend EffRequireSuccess= iff(OptionalOverrides, false, RequireSuccess)
    // presence-only
    | extend SuccessOK        = iff(EffRequireSuccess, SuccessCnt >= 1, true),
             FailureOK        = iff(RequireFailure,  FailureCnt >= 1, true)
    | extend OverSucc         = (not(EffRequireSuccess) and SuccessCnt > 0),
             OverFail         = (not(RequireFailure)   and FailureCnt > 0)
    | extend OverCollected    = (OverSucc or OverFail),
             OverReason       = case(OverSucc and OverFail, "Success+Failure",
                                     OverSucc,              "Success",
                                     OverFail,              "Failure", "")
    | extend Status = case(
         NoRequirement and Total == 0,                    "OK (not required)",
         NoRequirement and Total  > 0,                    "Over-collected",
         OptionalOverrides and Total == 0,                "OK (not required)",
         OptionalOverrides and Total  > 0,                "OK",
         Total == 0,                                      "N/A",
         not(SuccessOK) and not(FailureOK),               "Missing (both)",
         not(SuccessOK),                                  "Missing Success",
         not(FailureOK),                                  "Missing Failure",
         OverCollected,                                   "Over-collected",
                                                          "OK")
    | project Computer, Role, Category, Subcategory, Status, OverCollected, OverReason;

// 6) Aggregation & verdicts
// 6.1) Status ordering (impact rank) + helpers
let StatusOrder = datatable(Status:string, Ord:int)
[
  "Missing (both)", 0,
  "Missing Failure", 1,
  "Missing Success", 2,
  "Over-collected", 3,
  "OK", 4,
  "OK (not required)", 4,
  "N/A", 5
];
let Ord2Status = datatable(Ord:int, WorstStatus:string)
[
  0, "Missing (both)",
  1, "Missing Failure",
  2, "Missing Success",
  3, "Over-collected",
  4, "OK",
  5, "N/A"
];
// 6.2) Normalize status and attach ordering
let Base =
    PerHost_MW
    | extend StatusNorm = case(
        Status == "OK (not required)", "OK",
        isempty(Status), "N/A",
        Status
      )
    | join kind=leftouter (StatusOrder) on $left.StatusNorm == $right.Status
    | project Category, Subcategory, Computer, Ord,
              OverCollected = tobool(column_ifexists("OverCollected", false)),
              OverReason;
// 6.3) Totals per (Category, Subcategory)
let Totals =
    Base
    | summarize TotalHosts = dcount(Computer) by Category, Subcategory;
// 6.4) Worst rank per (Category, Subcategory)
let WorstPerCat =
    Base
    | summarize WorstOrd = min(Ord) by Category, Subcategory;
// 6.5) Count affected hosts at the worst rank and collect over-collection reasons
let WorstCount =
    Base
    | join kind=inner (WorstPerCat) on Category, Subcategory
    | where Ord == WorstOrd
    | summarize AffectedHosts = dcount(Computer),
                OverReasons = make_set_if(OverReason, OverCollected and isnotempty(OverReason))
        by Category, Subcategory, WorstOrd;
// 6.6) Final projection
WorstCount
| join kind=leftouter (Ord2Status) on $left.WorstOrd == $right.Ord
| join kind=leftouter (Totals) on Category, Subcategory
| extend PercentAffected = todouble(AffectedHosts) / todouble(TotalHosts) * 100.0
| extend Verdict = iff(WorstStatus == "Over-collected" and array_length(OverReasons) > 0,
                       strcat("Over-collected (", tostring(OverReasons[0]), ")"),
                       WorstStatus)
| project Category,
          Subcategory,
          Verdict,
          PercentAffected = round(PercentAffected, 1),
          AffectedHosts,
          TotalHosts
| order by Category asc, Subcategory asc
content.title: Member Server and Workstation Audit Summary

// ===============================================
// Sentinel Windows Audit Coverage - Config-driven Overview (Hive by Category)
// ===============================================
//
// Purpose:
// - Config-driven overview across both roles (DCs + Member/Workstation) with role filter.
// - Highlights missing required auditing and over-collection at the subcategory level.
// - Presence/volume is controlled by MinCount (defaults to 1 here).
//
// Inputs:
// - TimeRange (start, end)
// - PolicyProfile: "General" | "Stronger" (defaults to General if invalid)
// - HiveScope: "All" | "Domain Controller" | "Member/Workstation" (defaults to All)
// - SecurityEvent table
//
// Output (per subcategory = one Hive node):
// - %OK, %NotOK, host counts, placeholder flag (for empty subcategories)
//
// -----------------------------------------------
// 0) Parameters / context
set query_results_cache_max_age = time(10m);
set query_results_cache_per_shard;
let start = {TimeRange:start};
let end   = {TimeRange:end};
let MinCount = 1;
let PolicyProfileRaw = tostring("{PolicyProfile}");
let PolicyProfile = iif(PolicyProfileRaw in ("General","Stronger"), PolicyProfileRaw, "General");
let P_RoleRaw = tostring("{HiveScope}");
let P_Role = iif(P_RoleRaw in ("All","Domain Controller","Member/Workstation"), P_RoleRaw, "All");

// Which subcategories to include by their Scope:
// - For Member/Workstation we include only Scope == "All"
// - For DC and All we include both "All" and "DC"
let P_Scopes = case(P_Role == "Member/Workstation", dynamic(["All"]), dynamic(["All","DC"]));

// 1) Subcategory configuration (Category / Scope / in-scope EventIDs)

  "Security State Change", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, false,
  "Security State Change", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, false, false,
  "Security State Change", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, false, false,
  "Security State Change", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, false, false,


  "Security System Extension", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, false, false,
  "Security System Extension", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, false, false,
  "Security System Extension", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, false, false,
  "Security System Extension", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, false, false,


  "System Integrity", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, true, false,
  "System Integrity", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, true, false,
  "System Integrity", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, true, false,
  "System Integrity", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, true, false,




  "Logon", "Domain Controller",  "General",  true, true, false,
  "Logon", "Member/Workstation", "General",  true, true, false,
  "Logon", "Domain Controller",  "Stronger", true, true, false,
  "Logon", "Member/Workstation", "Stronger", true, true, false

];
// 3) Host population & role inference
// 3.1) Build the base host set from ALL configured EventIDs (Success + Failure)

let AllEventIds_Early =
    (
      SubcatConfig
      | mv-expand e = SuccessEvents
      | project EventID = toint(e)
    )
    | union
    (
      SubcatConfig
      | mv-expand e = FailureEvents
      | project EventID = toint(e)
    )
    | summarize by EventID;
let BaseHosts =
    SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated between (start .. end)
    | where EventID in (AllEventIds_Early)
    | summarize by Computer;

// 3.2) DC heuristic (Kerberos AS/TGS events imply Domain Controller)
let DCHeuristic =
    SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated between (start .. end)
    | where EventID in (4768, 4769, 4771)
    | summarize by Computer
    | extend IsDC = true;

// 3.3) Final roles for all base hosts
let Roles =
    BaseHosts
    | join kind=leftouter DCHeuristic on Computer
    | extend Role = iff(IsDC == true, "Domain Controller", "Member/Workstation")
    | project Computer, Role;

// 4) Event mapping & labeling
// 4.1) Build EventID â†’ (Category, Subcategory, Scope) map (union, dedup)
let EventMap = materialize(
    (
      SubcatConfig
      | mv-expand EventID = SuccessEvents
      | project Subcategory, Category, Scope, EventID = toint(EventID)
    )
    | union
    (
      SubcatConfig
      | mv-expand EventID = FailureEvents
      | project Subcategory, Category, Scope, EventID = toint(EventID)
    )
    | summarize by Subcategory, Category, Scope, EventID);

// 4.2) Label events by joining SecurityEvent with EventMap (ID pushdown)
let LabeledEvents =
  SecurityEvent
  | where TimeGenerated between (start .. end)
  | where EventID in (EventMap | project EventID)   // pushdown Ð¿Ð¾ ID
  | join kind=inner hint.strategy=broadcast (EventMap) on EventID
  | project Computer, Category, Subcategory, Scope, Keywords;


// 5) Outcome classification, counts, and universe by scope
// 5.1) Classify outcomes from Keywords; count per hostÃ—subcategory
let EventSummary =
  LabeledEvents
  | extend Outcome = case(
      Keywords == "0x8020000000000000","Success",
      Keywords == "0x8010000000000000","Failure","Unknown")
  | summarize
      SuccessCnt = countif(Outcome=="Success"),
      FailureCnt = countif(Outcome=="Failure"),
      Total      = count()
    by Computer, Category, Subcategory, Scope;

// 5.2) Build role-aware universe by selected scopes (P_Scopes)
let AllComputers = LabeledEvents | summarize by Computer;
let AllScopeHosts = AllComputers | extend Scope = "All";
let DCsOnly      = Roles | where Role == "Domain Controller" | project Computer | extend Scope = "DC";
let SubcatsByScope = SubcatConfig | where Scope in (P_Scopes) | project Subcategory, Category, Scope;
let Universe =
    (AllScopeHosts | union DCsOnly)
    | join kind=inner SubcatsByScope on Scope
    | project Computer, Category, Subcategory, Scope;


// 6) Per-host status evaluation
// 6.1) Join roles, counts, and policy; apply role filter (P_Role)
let PerHost =
    Universe
    | lookup (Roles) on Computer           // Ð¼Ð°Ð»ÐµÐ½ÑŒÐºÐ°Ñ ÑÐ¿Ñ€Ð°Ð²ÐºÐ° â†’ Ð°Ð²Ñ‚Ð¾-broadcast ÑÐ¿Ñ€Ð°Ð²Ð°
| extend Role = coalesce(Role, "Member/Workstation")
| where P_Role == "All" or Role == P_Role
    | join kind=leftouter EventSummary on Computer, Category, Subcategory
    | extend SuccessCnt = tolong(coalesce(SuccessCnt, 0)),
             FailureCnt = tolong(coalesce(FailureCnt, 0)),
             Total      = tolong(coalesce(Total, 0))
| lookup (PolicyMatrix | where Profile == PolicyProfile) on Subcategory, Role
| extend RequireSuccess   = tobool(RequireSuccess),
         RequireFailure   = tobool(RequireFailure),
         SuccessOptional  = tobool(SuccessOptional)
 // 6.2) Effective requirements (optional override can relax Success)         
| extend NoRequirement    = (not(RequireSuccess) and not(RequireFailure))                                  
| extend OptionalOverrides= (SuccessOptional and RequireSuccess and not(RequireFailure))                 
| extend EffRequireSuccess= iff(OptionalOverrides, false, RequireSuccess)
// 6.3) Required presence checks (MinCount threshold)
| extend SuccessOK        = iff(EffRequireSuccess, SuccessCnt >= MinCount, true),
         FailureOK        = iff(RequireFailure,  FailureCnt >= MinCount, true)
 // 6.4) Over-collection detection (collecting when not required)
| extend OverSucc         = (not(EffRequireSuccess) and SuccessCnt > 0),
         OverFail         = (not(RequireFailure)   and FailureCnt > 0)
| extend OverCollected    = (OverSucc or OverFail),
         OverReason       = case(OverSucc and OverFail, "Success+Failure",
                                 OverSucc,              "Success",
                                 OverFail,              "Failure",
                                                         "")
// 6.5) Final status assignment                                                         
| extend Status = case(
         NoRequirement and Total == 0,                    "OK (not required)",
         NoRequirement and Total  > 0,                    "Over-collected",
         OptionalOverrides and Total == 0,                "OK (not required)",
         OptionalOverrides and Total  > 0,                "OK",
         Total == 0,                                      "N/A",
         not(SuccessOK) and not(FailureOK),               "Missing (both)",
         not(SuccessOK),                                  "Missing Success",
         not(FailureOK),                                  "Missing Failure",
         OverCollected,                                   "Over-collected",
                                                          "OK")
| project Computer, Category, Subcategory, Status, OverCollected, OverReason;


// 7) Overview (Hive heatmap grouped by Category) â€” one tile per Subcategory
// 7.1) Bucketize per-host status into OK / Not OK / N/A
let Summary =
    PerHost
    | extend Bucket = case(
        Status in ("OK","OK (not required)"), "OK",
        Status == "N/A",                      "N/A",
                                              "Not OK")   // ÑÑŽÐ´Ð° Ð¿Ð¾Ð¿Ð°Ð´Ñ‘Ñ‚ Ð¸ "Over-collected"
    | summarize Hosts = dcount(Computer) by Category, Subcategory, Bucket;

// 7.2) Aggregate counts and compute %OK / %NotOK among decided hosts
let SubcatAgg =
    Summary
    | summarize 
        OK    = sumif(Hosts, Bucket=="OK"),
        NotOK = sumif(Hosts, Bucket=="Not OK"),
        NA    = sumif(Hosts, Bucket=="N/A")
      by Category, Subcategory
    | extend TotalHosts = OK + NotOK + NA,
             Den        = toreal(OK + NotOK)
    | extend OkPct    = iff(Den==0.0, real(0), round(100.0 * toreal(OK)    / Den, 1)),
             NotOkPct = iff(Den==0.0, real(0), round(100.0 * toreal(NotOK) / Den, 1));

// 7.3) Mark placeholders (subcategories with no EventIDs configured)
let SubcatFlags =
    SubcatConfig
    | extend IsPlaceholder = iif(array_length(SuccessEvents)==0 and array_length(FailureEvents)==0, true, false)
    | project Category, Subcategory, IsPlaceholder;

// 7.4) Final dataset for Hive: exactly one node per subcategory
SubcatAgg
| join kind=leftouter SubcatFlags on Category, Subcategory
| extend NodeId = strcat(Category, "|", Subcategory)  // unique node id across categories
| extend OkPct=iff(IsPlaceholder,100.0,OkPct)
| extend Value = OkPct                               
| project NodeId, Category, Subcategory, Hosts=TotalHosts, Value, OkPct, NotOkPct,IsPlaceholder
content.title: Audit Heat Map - {HiveScope}
